generalItems.name: Interesting food items
generalItems.blurb: Something weird that you normally wouldn't buy.

generalItems.name: Interesting cheeses
generalItems.blurb: Would be fun to sample something different. Doesn't matter if it's weird or if it ends up being gross. Just want to try new stuff.

generalItems.name: Anything else you think I would like

specificItems.name: Dorohedoro, Vol. 11 and above
specificItems.blurb: I have volumes 1-10, but there are 20-something in total so I'd like more of them.

specificItems.name: French Rolling Pin
specificItems.blurb: I want a cylindrical rolling pin that doesn't have the beveled ends. Stainless steel or high-quality plastic preferred over wood.

specificItems.name: Loaf Pan
specificItems.blurb: I'd like a larger bread pan.

specificItems.name: Re-usable bowl lids
specificItems.blurb: Stretch-over lids large enough for some of the general-use kitchen bowls we have.

specificItems.name: Iwachu Iron Tamagoyaki Omelette Pan
specificItems.blurb: This is a nice square omelette pan I'd like to get eventually.

specificItems.name: Cyglolite Hotshot Pro - 200
specificItems.blurb: I need a taillight for my road bike. When it gets dark I don't want to rely on just a reflector.

specificItems.name: Samsung SSD 860 EVO 2TB SSD
specificItems.blurb: I could use more internal storage for my desktop computer.

specificItems.name: Money for Full-Faced downhill-rated Mountain Bike Helmet
specificItems.blurb: I need to get a full-faced mountain bike helmet so I can eventually take a day-trip to a downhill bike park. I keep flip-flopping about which helmet I want specifically, but have still not quite made up my mind.

specificItems.name: Money for PC upgrade
specificItems.blurb: I'd like to do an upgrade for my desktop computer. It will take me about $1,000 to get it to where I want it. Any cash gifts would be fine.
